name: The Seven Keys: Escape Room
description:
Detective Jake Stone receives a call from police headquarters telling him to go to the Hoffmans' home where shots were reported.

Our detective on his first week on the job is heading on his worst adventure.

Each room is a different world.

Characteristics:

* Optimized and Re-designed Graphics
* Correction in the highlights
* Structured Mysteries
* Puzzles from easy to hard difficulty
* Inventory to review purchased items
* Optimized Touch
* Up to 3 Profiles to share with your friends
* Save function in the place you want
* History in English
* English subtitles


The Seven Keys Escape Room
